channel.title: Door Screw Up!
channel.description:
Ok, seeing as i was told using/making doors work was virtually impossible. I came up with the idea of. When you click on the object it teleports you to your destination instead. (the other side of the door).
So, here's the code. (Pimp3d tut) Helped.
[code]case 9369: teleportToX = 2724; teleportToY = 3497; sendMessage("Yay for you, you used a door!"); sendMessage("Woodcut to earn money!"); break;[/code]
And this is what shows in my run.bat
[code]Runescapw Has Started successfuly [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369[/code]
I get no errors what so ever. But when i click on the object (In this case Hot Vent Door). It doesn't teleport me to the desired place.
So, do any of you know what's up with it?

item.title: Door Screw Up!
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Ok, seeing as i was told using/making doors work was virtually impossible. I came up with the idea of. When you click on the object it teleports you to your destination instead. (the other side of the door).

So, here’s the code. (Pimp3d tut) Helped.

case 9369: teleportToX = 2724; teleportToY = 3497; sendMessage("Yay for you, you used a door!"); sendMessage("Woodcut to earn money!"); break;

And this is what shows in my run.bat

Runescapw Has Started successfuly [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369 [client-1-zameix]: atObject: 2726,3494 objectID: 9369

I get no errors what so ever. But when i click on the object (In this case Hot Vent Door). It doesn’t teleport me to the desired place.

So, do any of you know what’s up with it?
